mapper.sql: t_house_asset_log . id , t_house_asset_log.user_id AS userId, t_house_asset_log.old_user_id AS oldUserId, t_house_asset_log.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_asset_log.note, t_house_asset_log.create_time AS createTime, t_house_asset_log.update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_asset_log.* FROM t_house_asset_log WHERE t_house_asset_log.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_asset_log.id

SELECT ,t_end_user.phone,t_end_user.name as username,t_end_user.real_name as realName,t_end_user.avatar,t_house_property_building.code as buildingCode, t_house_property_community.community as communityName,t_house_asset.house_number as houseNumber
FROM t_house_asset_log JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_asset_log.asset_id = t_house_asset.id JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_asset_log.user_id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_asset_log.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.old_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.oldUserId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_house_asset_log.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_asset_log.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
and (t_end_user.org_id=#{record.orgId} AND t_end_user.current_org_id IS NULL) OR (t_end_user.current_org_id=#{record.orgId})
And( OR t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_asset.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_community.community LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
ORDER BY t_house_asset_log.update_time DESC , t_house_asset_log.create_time DESC
